attributes.action: Call a general election in September this year
attributes.additional_details: Every newspaper and news programme has shown evidence of extreme poverty in this, the 5th richest in the world.
attributes.background: We have a minority government, that has defied all common decency and caused the deaths of 150,000 people through its austerity measures. Defied UN reports that confirm these facts. And threaten more attacks on the poor and disabled.
